{
    "number": 243921,
    "data": "1,1,6,53,612,8676,145268,2798355,60852004,1472460760,39202586348,1138006266618,35750917265544,1207874695612336,43655110115967528,1680097198812367783,68578132320350944324,2958457556868808457800,134469635178557071054492,6421829932908536633173110",
    "name": "G.f.: 1 = Sum_{n>=0} a(n) * x^n*(1-x)^(n+1) / Product_{k=1..n} (1 + 2*(k+1)*x).",
    "comment": [
        " Triangle T = A243920 is generated by sums of matrix powers of itself such that:",
        "T(n,k) = Sum_{j=1..n-k-1} [T^j](n-1,k) with T(n+1,n) = 2*n+1 and T(n,n)=0 for n>=0."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = A243920(n+1,1) / 3."
    ],
    "example": [
        "G.f.: 1 = 1*(1-x) + 1*x*(1-x)^2/(1+2*2*x) + 6*x^2*(1-x)^3/((1+2*2*x)*(1+2*3*x)) + 53*x^3*(1-x)^4/((1+2*2*x)*(1+2*3*x)*(1+2*4*x)) + 612*x^4*(1-x)^5/((1+2*2*x)*(1+2*3*x)*(1+2*4*x)*(1+2*5*x)) +..."
    ],
    "program": [
        "(PARI) {a(n)=if(n<0, 0, polcoeff(1-sum(k=0, n-1, a(k)*x^k*(1-x)^(k+1)/prod(j=1, k, 1+2*(j+1)*x+x*O(x^n))), n))}",
        "for(n=0, 20, print1(a(n), \", \"))"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A243920, A243922, A243923, A208676."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "0,3",
    "author": "_Paul D. Hanna_, Jun 15 2014",
    "references": 3,
    "revision": 7,
    "time": "2014-06-15T22:40:58-04:00",
    "created": "2014-06-15T22:16:46-04:00"
}
